title: Karma is a bitch

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Cass, Mumu, Jayce and Ekko were a premade.
Was placed on 2 games with them where I was harassed for not landing my skillshots as Swain and having a different build on Ali.

Lo and behold on the 3rd game the main chatter box, being Mumu tells the team I am on that they are glad I am not on their team.

Whether I am a capable player or not, the one game I was not on their team, they lost and left the lobby without a comeback.
Thanks to the 4 of them for making my late night a fun one ;)
Thanks to my teammates for being badass.

replies.body:
lol i thought you were complaining about the champ

alistar has pretty long cd's which is why tear isnt good on him. you need tankiness and cdr to constantly set up/peel for your teams carries with headbutt and pulverise. if you really want the mana get frozen heart or even mikaels. frozen heart at least goes well with oppression mastery which is what you shouldve had as aram ali

ultmately though janna also got tear and id argue its harder for her to stack it, so its pretty silly but also awkward they'd harass you for that while their friend has it too lol
